Package aguiaj.cards

This package contains classes/enums related to playing cards.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Represents the playing cards.
    CardHand
    Represents card hands, composed of zero or more ordered cards.
    CardStack
    Represents card stacks, which can be displayed according to different modes: all cards hidden, only the top card visible, all cards shown.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Rank
    Represents the 13 card ranks.
    Suit
    Represents the 4 card suits.

Package aguiaj.cards Description

This package contains classes/enums related to playing cards.
